Name: Street volleyball - Invitation
About the game: Street volleyball is a funny sport game. There are many characters you and choose, and each have their own special ability. Play volleyball matches with different players from different regions. Use you ability and find a way to defeat the opponent. Only with skill and quick reflexes can you beat them and become a champion. Choose your character Each character has their own special ability. You choose the character and use the ability to beat other players. Interestingly, your abilities may have advantages or disadvantages over your enemy's abilities. So you need to figure out a way to beat your opponent. Abilities There are two main kinds of abilities: the constitution abilities and ball abilities. The constitution abilities: you can have double jump, super jump, or speed enhancement. The ball abilities: You are able to play special balls, i.e. to stick a bomb on a ball, to play a floating ball or drop ball, and to teleport balls, etc. Besides, there is a role, he always play a second ball. There are two balls in game, so it is very funny. **Animation Hypertext Engine** We develop our own Animation Hypertext Engine, which run script on the fly. Game scripts are editable, so you can modify or add any content of this game if you are interested.
